articles.title: 6 Thoughts on a Thursday - Irish Sports Daily
articles.description: Thoughts on the old mantra of running the ball/stopping the run being extra important against Syracuse, on how the punt block team has made a huge impact on field position, the ascension of Notre Dame's two young tackles, and more
